CustomField.description: Async dispatch strategy for conversational agents: Low (Queueable for guaranteed processing), High (Platform Events for high throughput, fire-and-forget). Ignored for Batch/Email agents which always use Queueables. Note: Platform Events don't guarantee processing.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For Conversational agents: choose Low for guaranteed sequential processing, High for high-throughput concurrent chats (fire-and-forget). Batch and Email agents ignore this setting.
CustomField.label: Async Dispatch Type
